name: TheMagicEgg
description:
This magical tangram game will keep you entertained for hours, stimulating and challenging your mind in a relaxed and enjoyable way. Break the Magic Egg apart and rearrange its 9 pieces to discover new amazing shapes.

Highlights:
- Three difficulty levels:
* EASY: Great for kids.
* MEDIUM: For a challenging game.
* HARD: For experts only!
- More than 200 puzzles.
- Relaxing music.
- Intuitive controls.
- Hint System.
- Universal app, buy it once play it on all your devices.
- Respects music already playing in your device.

The EASY level, specially designed for kids, encourages them to explore mathematical concepts like geometric shapes, symmetry, area, rotation and translation.
Play on the MEDIUM level for a relaxing challenge, and move on to HARD when you are ready to test your puzzle solving skills.
